title: Yumi Looks to Build Healthier Generation of Babies
itunes:title: Yumi Looks to Build Healthier Generation of Babies
description:
Evelyn Rusli and Angela Sutherland, Co-Founders of Yumi, discuss their baby food startup that provides nutrition-first meals and snacks for babies made from high quality, organic ingredients sourced from local farmers.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
